meanings.definition: The bone on the inner side of the forearm.
meanings.sent1: She felt pain in her ulnas after lifting heavy boxes.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined her ulnas to check for any fractures.
meanings.sent3: The ulnas in her arms were like sturdy pillars supporting her body.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as unyielding as the ulnas in his arms.
meanings.sent5: The ulnas, like strong beams, provided structure to her arms.
